author: cardano4climate
title: Cardano4Climate Community Events
description: Cardano's impact on Climate Change must be measurable. Events & meetings are crucial to connect local challenges & mission-driven solutions
solution: Organize, facilitate, expand, promote, & record monthly events & weekly meetings
experience:
Hosted after town hall breakout rooms during Fund 6
Hosted weekly pre town hall meetings since mid October
Hosted first event 11-23-2021
